text: This may sound odd, but I think the most direct way to fight what the Repubs are trying to do to our voting rights is urgent and broad education about slavery in America. We need to quickly learn who we, this country, really are. Even people who immigrated here. No matter what was done to us, we joined a country built on slavery. It never went away, despite what we were taught in school, and what we came to believe when we elected a black president. We are very much still fighting slavery.
